eip155:1/erc20:0xed4064f376cb8d68f770fb1.en: This token represents a liquidity pool on Curve, a leading decentralized exchange. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP token on [ShapeShift](/defi/earn) to earn yield. This liquidity pool contains [CRV](/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0xd533a949740bb3306d119cc777fa900ba034cd52) and [ETH](/assets/eip155:1/slip44:60). To acquire Curve CRV-ETH, deposit [CRV](/assets/eip155:1/erc20:0xd533a949740bb3306d119cc777fa900ba034cd52) and/or [ETH](/assets/eip155:1/slip44:60) on [Curve](https://curve.fi/crveth/deposit). Please be aware that as liquidity pools are composed of differently-priced assets, they are subject to impermanent loss.

eip155:1/erc20:0xdc49108ce5c57bc3408c3a5: FOXy is a rebasing ERC-20 Token, which you can exchange 1:1 with FOX Tokens, that offer both yield and profit redistribution from the ShapeShift DAO. Get more out of your FOX without losing your governance power.
cosmos:cosmoshub-4/slip44:118: Cosmos (ATOM) is a cryptocurrency that powers an ecosystem of blockchains designed to scale and interoperate with each other. The Cosmos vision aligns with the ShapeShift vision of a multi chain future, and enables a network of blockchains to be able to communicate with each other in a decentralized manner. Cosmos is a proof-of-stake chain and allows holders to stake their ATOM to earn rewards using ShapeShift.
cosmos:osmosis-1/ibc:27394FB092D2ECCD561: Cosmos (ATOM) on Osmosis is a proof of stake cryptocurrency that powers an ecosystem of blockchains designed to interoperate and communicate with each other in a decentralized manner on the Osmosis blockchain, an alternative decentralized [IBC](https://tendermint.com/ibc/) blockchain.
